Kids can DIY and customize their creations, adding imaginative touches to make their builds more colorful and exciting, ensuring endless creativity and enjoyment

Safe, Durable, Perfect Gift: Made from premium ABS plastic, this set features smooth edges and a durable design. Every piece undergoes strict safety tests to ensure worry-free playtime. It’s a thoughtful and safe gift for kids, offering hours of fun and a rewarding building experience

name: Spark & Wow Spinny Gears | Wooden Gear Board with 6 Pieces in 3 Sizes | Cause and Effect Toys | Create Colorful, Spinning Combinations
short_description: 6 COLORS AND 3 SIZES -- This wooden gear board comes with 6 different-colored cogs in 3 sizes. Slot the cogs onto the wooden pegs and use the largest gear to spin all the pieces.
CAN YOU SPIN ALL THE GEARS AT ONCE? -- Practice critical thinking and spatial reasoning by matching each gear to an appropriate outline. Can you fit all the gears on the board at once?
DESIGNED FOR TODDLERS -- The components on this gear board are chunky and lightweight, making them easy for small hands to manipulate. The largest gear also features a handle for easy spinning.
EXPLORE DIFFERENT COMBINATIONS -- Swap pieces of the same size to create different color combinations. Which pieces can you swap? How many combinations can you make?
DESIGNED TO LAST -- Made from durable, solid wood, this gear puzzle is designed to withstand years of home or classroom use.
DEVELOP INTENTIONAL PLAY -- Explore cause and effect, color recognition, problem solving, and more. This gear puzzle is excellent for introducing toddlers to early STEM concepts and intentional play.
SPARK AND WOW FOR MODERN PLAY -- We’re here to provide innovative toys for your little ones. Our products inspire kids to learn life skills through exploration, sensory experiences and mindfulness.

name: STEM Gears Toys for Kids Ages 3+, Creative Learning Building Blocks, 20Pcs Educational Construction Toy Set, Electric & Manual Dual Mode, Versatile Gear Playset Gift for Boys & Girls
short_description: 【Innovative STEM Gear Toy】The Fivoro gear toy features a unique interlocking structure with 20 colorful gear pieces that kids can freely assemble and combine. With exciting space capsule themes, it sparks imagination and creativity. While building, children naturally develop logical thinking, reasoning, and problem-solving skills—making it a fun and engaging introduction to STEM education for kids aged 3 and up.

【Dual Power Modes】This gear toy supports both battery-powered motion (𝐫𝐞𝐪𝐮𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐬 𝟑 𝐀𝐀 𝐛𝐚𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐬, 𝐧𝐨𝐭 𝐢𝐧𝐜𝐥𝐮𝐝𝐞𝐝) and manual spinning. Kids can observe how gears link and rotate, learning the basics of mechanical motion, energy transfer, and design. It’s a hands-on educational toy that teaches counting, sorting, and construction while introducing children to physical science and engineering principles through play.

【Fun Parent-Child Activity】Designed for cooperative play, this STEM building set is perfect for parent-child interaction. As you build together, you can guide your child through creative thinking and hands-on learning. The process encourages bonding, boosts your child’s confidence, and helps reduce screen time—turning playtime into quality family time filled with learning and laughter.

【Safe & Durable Materials】Made from BPA-free, eco-friendly plastic, each piece is durable, smooth, and rounded to protect little hands. The toy meets safety standards for children’s products and is suitable for kids aged 3 and above. Whether used as an early learning toy, building kit, or STEM gear set, it's a reliable choice for families.

【Great Gift for Kids】The Fivoro Gear Toy Set makes an excellent gift for birthdays, Christmas, Halloween, back-to-school, or any special occasion. It’s an exciting and educational present that inspires hands-on creativity and skill development. Ideal for both boys and girls aged 3+, it’s a thoughtful gift that keeps kids engaged, learning, and having fun.

product_description: Machines in Motion brings engineering concepts to life with a vibrant 116-piece building set designed for kids ages 5 and up. As they build, kids explore motion, force, and mechanical design while strengthening problem-solving and fine motor skills. The set encourages creativity and STEM learning through open-ended play, making it perfect for classrooms or home use. Whether creating vehicles, cranes, or imaginative contraptions, young builders gain confidence and critical thinking skills with every project. Machines in Motion offers endless opportunities for discovery, collaboration, and fun—ideal for kids who love science and engineering. Each set also works with other Gears! sets and increases the playability of every piece.
